note.p: Career: Ex-Research Fellow, Exeter College, Oxford; Curator of the Pitt Rivers Museum, Oxford; ex-President Roy Anthrop Inst (1903-1904), of Section H, British Association (1904), of Museums Association (1909); President Folk Lore Society (1922); Huxley Lecturer, Royal Anthropological Institute (1921)
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1939-1941 vol 3 pp 109-115, plate, by A C Haddon
